Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids expressing wild-type or mutant DJ-1.

Readout description.Result Description: The A106P mutant showed reduced protein stability compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% compared to wild-type.

Material used.Description: Immunohistochemical analysis was performed on brain tissues from DJ-1 knockout mice.

Readout description.Result Description: DJ-1 knockout mice showed increased dopaminergic neuron degeneration.

Technical replicates.Description: No technical replicates were explicitly mentioned.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type mice were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No negative control was explicitly mentioned.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: No significant degeneration observed in wild-type mice.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant degeneration observed in mutant mice.
